CardData.FlavorText: Dodging a blow, you lose your balance and fall backwards into the dark stream. Friendly hands quickly retrieve you coughing and spluttering from the water. You feel...strange, wonderfully strange. The forest blurs as a strong dark force seems to pull you to the ground, guiding you into a sweet and deep oblivion.

Localization.Title: Unsteady Footing
Localization.Text: This Location Only. Exhaust a random Ally. It does not ready during the next Upkeep phase
